Warehouse Keeper Cliff: Don't tell my boss, but this job can get kinda slow. That's why we warehouse keepers created our own fun. I often play bingo with the other warehouse keepers. Sometime I even go over to another town's warehouse to play bingo on my days off. Unfortunately, something recently happened because of my bingo playing and I need some help... Oh, you don't look like someone experienced enough to help. Maybe you know someone? (Only characters who are level 40 and above may undertake this quest.)
